price: Wͻn a wɔanya kwankyerε no nso Yεde tenenee bεsan aka wͻn ho na yεde wͻn Nyamesuro nso ama wͻn.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ زَادَهُمۡ هُدٗى وَءَاتَىٰهُمۡ تَقۡوَىٰهُمۡ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ih'tadaw zādahum hudan waātāhum taqwāhum
